posts.post_content:
check/mo, pp gift

t213 johnson sgc 30--SOLD


[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/fisherboy7/cardsale/websize/1914%20T213-II%20Johnson%20-%20SGC%2030F.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/fisherboy7/cardsale/websize/1914%20T213-II%20Johnson%20-%20SGC%2030R.jpg[/IMG]

thanks for the compliment rob.

the american beauty and mcgraw have gone to ebay.  nobody needs a huge johnson in their collection?

burkett also on ebay at very reasonable bin price...much lower than vcp
I could use that Johnson in my collection! Doing any trades?

jason,

i'm selling the card for another collector, so unless you have some scarce chief bender type he needs he's looking for cash (to purchase more bender cards).  he's authorized me to to discount the card a little but that's about it.
Sounds good, no Benders but I might have to scrape up some change to make it done.

final bump for rock bottom prices. 

these are the final cards left from ben. he appreciates all the business from board members and hope you enjoy the cards as much as he has all these years. he's getting a REALLY nice card from these sales.
